Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
bridge between model and virtual view When the virtual view receive a message from a client it parses and creates a ServerEvent which call the controller to update the model

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • setUserInput

      public void setUserInput​(int[] userInput)
      set last user input coordinates
      Parameters:
      userInput - array of integer containing user input

    • control

      public void control()
      take userInput and execute a power with that correct input, if ActionExecutor.doAction() return 1 the controller autonomously execute the next power.

    • loginControl

      public int loginControl​(java.lang.String nickName)
      set this client NickName by checking the VirtualView lobby and,if it is empty, this player is also the party Owner. Check if this client nickName has already been chosen.
      Parameters:
      nickName - name of the client
      Returns:
      0 if this name is already taken else 1;

    • setPlayerGod

      public boolean setPlayerGod​(java.lang.String godName, java.lang.String playerName)
      Set the selected player god to the selected Client. use GodCardsDeck to create a GodCard , godName is not in the currentGodList signals the client with a CommandFailureEventBean. If this client is the last one to have chosen a god the server notify broadcast that everybody have chosen a god with EveryGodChosenEventBean
      Parameters:
      godName - name of the god
      playerName - NickName of the client that requested the particular god.
      Returns:
      true if the God is successfully set else return false

    • startGameControl

      public void startGameControl​(int numOfPlayer)
      creates an ActionExecutor, Gamemaster and the map. if number of player chosen to start is less or greater than the size of players in the virtualLobby signals the client with a CommandFailureEventBean
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayer - integer of the number of player selected

    • setCurrentGodList

      public boolean setCurrentGodList​(java.lang.String god1, java.lang.String god2, java.lang.String god3)
      set current godList by checking if the gods passed by the party owner are available to be picked. Check if every passed gods is contained in currentGodList. currentList is created by parsing GodCardList.xml. if oine of the gods doesn't exists signals to the client with a commandFailureEventBean
      Parameters:
      god1 - partyOwner god choice
      god2 - partyOwner god choice
      god3 - partyOwner god choice
      Returns:
      true if the list is correctly created else false;

    • addScannerInToList

      public void addScannerInToList​(LineClientSocketsAndPort lineClientSocketsAndPort)
      add the tuple of socket,socket port.
      Parameters:
      lineClientSocketsAndPort - lineSocketAndPort of a newly connected client

    • deleteElementInScannerInList

      public void deleteElementInScannerInList​(java.lang.String port)
      remove lineClientScannerIn with the specified port
      Parameters:
      port - String that represent the port of the socket

    • getLineClientSocketsAndPortListSize

      public int getLineClientSocketsAndPortListSize()
